title: [Large-Scale] Workshop on Cognitive Load Management in Collaborative Instructional Design in 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and foundational instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Considering work-study balance for workplace learners, a phased approach is needed for those without prior 3D virtual environment experience.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of cognitive load occurring in 3D virtual environments
Learners can apply at least two cognitive load reduction strategies when collaboratively designing 3D virtual learning scenarios
Through project-based assessments, learners can design interactive language learning content in 3D virtual environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
